bill.title: Hawaii Paroling Authority; Appropriation
bill.description: Increases membership of the Hawaii paroling authority from three to five. Appropriates funds. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to PBM, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 7
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBM on Thursday, 02-02-12 9:00AM in House conference room 309.
(H) The committee(s) on PBM recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-08-12 10:45AM in conference room 309.

(H) The committees on PBM recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, Luke, Saiki, Souki, Takumi, Yamashita, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) M. Lee, Takai.
(H) Reported from PBM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 272-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and C. Lee, M. Lee excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-14-12 2:05PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Herkes, Ito, Luke, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Carroll, Coffman, McKelvey.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 630-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes, Kawakami, M. Lee, Mizuno, Morikawa excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-23-12 11:00AM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org
(H) The committee(s) on FIN recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-28-12 5:00PM in conference room 308.
(H) This measure has been deleted from the meeting scheduled on Tuesday 02-28-12 5:00PM in conference room 308.
(H) Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-29-12 4:30PM in conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Har; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 928-12) as amended in HD 3, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 3 with Representative(s) Hanohano, Har, Pine voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Ching, Marumoto, Thielen, Ward voting no (4) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 229).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to PGM/JDL, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on PGM/JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-21-12 10:05AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Ihara, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Gabbard.

(S) The committee(s) on PGM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PGM were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Kidani, Ryan, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Baker.
(S) Reported from PGM/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2972) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-29-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kouchi.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3308) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 629) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 547).
(H) House conferees appointed: Aquino, Keith-Agaran, Oshiro Co-Chairs; Cullen, Ito, Fontaine.
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 612).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Espero, Chair; Hee, Kidani, Co-Chair(s); Ihara, Slom.
